survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users about their experience with digital banking services, including ease of use, features, and security perceptions.

questions.question_text: How often do you use your bank's digital banking services (e.g., mobile app, online banking)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use your bank's digital banking services (e.g., mobile app, online banking)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital banking features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital banking features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall user interface of your bank's digital banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall user interface of your bank's digital banking platform?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you prefer digital banking over visiting a physical branch?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional text input (SINGLE_CHOICE)

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you prefer digital banking over visiting a physical branch?

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced any technical issues while using your bank's digital banking services?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no question to filter respondents for follow-up questions.

script.question_text: Have you ever experienced any technical issues while using your bank's digital banking services?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the technical issue you encountered.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the technical issue you encountered.

questions.question_text: How confident do you feel about the security of your bank's digital banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for confidence measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How confident do you feel about the security of your bank's digital banking platform?

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in your bank's digital banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather innovative ideas. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in your bank's digital banking platform?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your bank's digital banking services to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for likelihood measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your bank's digital banking services to a friend or colleague?

questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the age ranges are mutually exclusive.
